overview:
John is a serial entrepreneur with a core expertise in technology and operations management.

Currently, John leads the architecture, design and development of GreenLink Networks’ technology solutions. Prior to joining GreenLink, John co-founded RadiusIM, an early player in location based services. At RadiusIM, he led the design and development of a technology platform that served 5 million users around the globe. John also co-founded CallStreet, a financial information company serving buy and sell side financial analysts. Here he architected and built CallStreet’s technology platform and was active in managing the operations of the business. CallStreet was sold to FactSet Research Systems (NYSE: FDS) in 2004.

Prior to the startup world he was a management consultant with Booz & Company, where he advised on growth strategies and organizational design for private and public sector organizations. John holds an M.B.A. from Columbia Business School and a B.S.E. in Bioengineering from the University of Pennsylvania.
